00301     // Additional get/set - Functions
00303     //@todo make sure the type specific behaviour is as documented
00316     template<typename T> PropertyValue &setPropertyAs( const KeyType &key, const T &val ) {
00317         PropertyValue &ret = propertyValue( key );
00318 
00319         if( ret.isEmpty() ) {
00320             const bool needed = ret.isNeeded();
00321             ( ret = val ).needed() = needed;
00322         } else if( ret->is<T>() ) {
00323             ret->castTo<T>() = val;
00324         } else { // don't overwrite already set properties with a different type
00325             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Property " << MSubject( key ) << " is already set to " << MSubject( ret.toString( true ) ) << " won't override with " << MSubject( Value<T>( val ).toString( true ) );
00326         }
00327 
00328         return ret;
00329     }

00380 // OK, lets define treeNode
00381 namespace isis
00382 {
00383 namespace util
00384 {
00385 namespace _internal
00386 {
00390 class treeNode
00391 {
00392     PropertyMap m_branch;
00393     PropertyValue m_leaf;
00394 public:
00395     bool empty()const {
00396         return m_branch.isEmpty() && m_leaf.isEmpty();
00397     }
00398     bool is_leaf()const {
00399         LOG_IF( ! ( m_branch.isEmpty() || m_leaf.isEmpty() ), Debug, error ) << "There is a non empty leaf at a branch. This should not be.";
00400         return m_branch.isEmpty();
00401     }
00402     const PropertyMap &getBranch()const {
00403         return m_branch;
00404     }
00405     PropertyMap &getBranch() {
00406         return m_branch;
00407     }
00408     PropertyValue &getLeaf() {
00409         assert( is_leaf() );
00410         return m_leaf;
00411     }
00412     const PropertyValue &getLeaf()const {
00413         assert( is_leaf() );
00414         return m_leaf;
00415     }
00416     bool operator==( const treeNode &ref )const {
00417         return m_branch == ref.m_branch && m_leaf == ref.m_leaf;
00418     }
00419     std::string toString()const {
00420         std::ostringstream o;
00421         o << *this;
00422         return o.str();
00423     }
00424 };
00425 }
00426 
00428 // and now we can define walkTree (needs treeNode to be defined)
00430 
00434 template<class Predicate> struct PropertyMap::walkTree {
00435     KeyList &m_out;
00436     const KeyType m_prefix;
00437     walkTree( KeyList &out, const KeyType &prefix ): m_out( out ), m_prefix( prefix ) {}
00438     walkTree( KeyList &out ): m_out( out ) {}
00439     void operator()( const_reference ref ) const {
00440         if ( ref.second.is_leaf() ) {
00441             if ( Predicate()( ref ) )
00442                 m_out.insert( m_out.end(), ( m_prefix != "" ? m_prefix + "/" : "" ) + ref.first );
00443         } else {
00444             const PropertyMap &sub = ref.second.getBranch();
00445             std::for_each( sub.begin(), sub.end(), walkTree<Predicate>( m_out, ref.first ) );
00446         }
00447     }
00448 };
00449 
00450 // as well as PropertyMap::getProperty ...
00451 template<typename T> T PropertyMap::getPropertyAs( const KeyType &key ) const
00452 {
00453     const mapped_type *entry = findEntry( util::istring( key ) );
00454 
00455     if( entry ) {
00456         const PropertyValue &ref = entry->getLeaf();
00457 
00458         if( !ref.isEmpty() )
00459             return ref->as<T>();
00460     }
00461 
00462     LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Returning " << Value<T>().toString( true ) << " because property " << key << " does not exist";
00463     return T();
00464 }
00465 
00466 }
00467 }
00468 
00469 // and finally define the streaming output for treeNode
00470 namespace std
00471 {
00473 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00474 basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::_internal::treeNode &s )
00475 {
00476     if( s.is_leaf() )
00477         out << s.getLeaf();
00478     else
00479         out << "[[Subtree with " << s.getBranch().getKeys().size() << " elements]]";
00480 
00481     return out;
00482 }
00484 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00485 basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::PropertyMap &s )
00486 {
00487     isis::util::PropertyMap::FlatMap buff = s.getFlatMap();
00488     isis::util::listToOStream( buff.begin(), buff.end(), out );
00489     return out;
00490 }
00491 }
